name: DecoHomes
description:
This game has been developped during the Global Game Jam 2019 in the Malaga Jam site. The aim of this game is to create your own Home by choosing different items. Those items will have an impact on the light and ambience sound on the house. 

There is no right answer. Once you feel glad with what you have created and if you can imagine yourself living there, PRESS the "Opening Party Button" on your Smartphone and launch the invitations.  Your preferece is the right answer. You will finish the game but you will be starting a new Home.

Special thanks to Krill Audio for their help. (https://krillaudio.com/)
